english.segment1: you can shine light into the darkness. You can set every prisoner free. You can make streams flow in the desert. This is what we are longing to see. Because we know and we believe
english.segment2: Nothing, nothing is impossible for You. Anything, anything can happen when Your power breaks through. Hear our cry for Your supernatural touch. God of miracles come and visit us
english.segment3: Come Lord, shine light into the darkness. Come Lord, set every prisoner free. Come Lord, make streams flow in the desert. This is what we are longing to see. Because we know and we believe
